title: \??\C:\ Question Marks in Paths
content: I often come across paths similar to \??\C:\Windows when looking in memory.  I have been unable to understand why the double '?' is appended to some paths. My google-fu is failing me with the ability to find a reason for the double '?'.Any assistance would be appreciated.
